title: Is Kamala Harris Blagiariz Martin Luther King Jr.?
subtitle: An interview to 2020 with the elected Vice President bears some similarity to the 1965 Playboy interview with the Civil Rights Icon.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In an interview in October 2020, the United States Vice-President-elect Kamala Harris told a story about her experience in attending a protest against civil rights as a child who had been robbed of an interview in 1965 with Martin Luther King, Jr.
